qrList.label: 总结姬plus
qrList.message:
/getchatlore |
/setvar key=chatlore |
/findentry file={{getvar::chatlore}} field=comment 聊天记录缓存 |
/if left={{pipe}} right="" rule=neq else={:/createentry file={{getvar::chatlore}} |/setvar key=cacheUID | /setentryfield file={{getvar::chatlore}} uid={{getvar::cacheUID}} field=comment 聊天记录缓存 |/setentryfield file={{getvar::chatlore}} uid={{getvar::cacheUID}} field=constant true |/setentryfield file={{getvar::chatlore}} uid={{getvar::cacheUID}} field=position 1|:} {::} |
/getentryfield file={{getvar::chatlore}} field=content {{getvar::cacheUID}} |
/setvar key=cache |
/setvar key=OriginalText ""|
/input 开始总结从第x层开始的10层|
/setvar key=i |
/times guard=on 10 {:
  /messages names=on {{getvar::i}} |
  /regex name=处女座3 |处女座 1号正则 |处女座 2号正则 |
  /addvar key=OriginalText {{pipe}} |
  /addvar key=OriginalText "

" |
  /hide {{getvar::i}} |
  /addvar key=i 1 |
  :} |
/preset Virgo_Preset_Summarizer_plus |
/wait 2000 |
/gen lock=on |
/addvar key=cache |
/setentryfield file={{getvar::chatlore}} uid={{getvar::cacheUID}} field=content {{getvar::cache}} |
/flushvar key=i |
